title: Ben Macintyre on Agent Sonya – the greatest female spy in history
itunes:title: Ben Macintyre on Agent Sonya – the greatest female spy in history
itunes:subtitle: Ben Macintyre tells the incredible story of a German-born woman who spied for the Soviet Union against both Britain and Nazi Germany. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Journalist and bestselling author Ben Macintyre talks to us about his latest book, Agent Sonya: Lover, Mother, Soldier, Spy, which tells the incredible story of a German-born woman who spied for the Soviet Union against both Britain and Nazi Germany, and helped transform the balance of power in the Cold War. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
